package.name: Crypt_CHAP
package.description: This package provides Classes for generating CHAP packets. Currently these types of CHAP are supported: * CHAP-MD5 * MS-CHAPv1 * MS-CHAPv2 For MS-CHAP the mhash extension must be loaded.

release.notes: * Eliminated notices (Bug #190). * Handle Passwords allways as Strings (Bug #193). * BugFix: lmPasswordHash() wrong DES-Hashing (Bug #41).
* Eliminated notices (Bug #190). * Handle Passwords allways as Strings (Bug #193). * BugFix: lmPasswordHash() wrong DES-Hashing (Bug #41).
* Added LAN-Manager support * Generate MS-CHAPv1 response-packet
* CHAP-MD5 is stable * MS-CHAP is currently not completely implemented
